body: Ow shit this guy below me knows what dickshit clueless husband is Big respect for u Reyas✊

JFC GUYS, I can't believe in this and the next chapter commenters are like "HAHA THIS IS UNREALISTIC BC THE HUSBAND WOULD KNOW!!" no bitch, the husband wouldn't know. I've seen worse than this in RL a bunch of times and the husbands don't get the hint. If you think I'm lying, that means you're probably the type of guy that would be one of those clueless cucks
wow. your husband working his ass off and eating cup ramen, when you having affairs on an onsen with random dudes. just wow... i can't digest this shit. seriously.
its good at start but the rest just meh

Hay poco realismo por que cuando una mujer se pone a buscar extraños por internet para follar nunca lo hace tan frecuente para que el marido no sospeche ademas irse de viaje con unos de esos tipos sabiendo que puede ser peligroso asta las prostitutas son cuidadosas con eso debido a los secuestros o que las violen.
pretty realistic, a bit short tho
Would be better if those old man fuck her too

Man!! Stories like this are so unrealistic. Here she told her husband she went to a trip with her friends. And when the husband will come back and want to see picture of the trip what will she do then??
from the streets she came and to the streets she shall return

Ohh man... i just listened a story, a real story, was a  woman cheating on her husband... he was suspecting about that, the worst? the kid they had was not the biological husband´  s kid... but he was there, because he trusted in her. 

I hate NTR, i mean, perhaps its fake, but i still think, everytime i read something like this... that outside, there is a story that here, on nhentai, we can see it. When i think someone outside can feel like this... geez, i just cannot read this, cannot. I need to be strong.
This is story #1 of a collection here (raw): https://nhentai.net/g/277601/
I have no idea why did I read it, I hate the cheating stuff, I'm angry instead of horny
